firstProduct.caffeDescription: Mysterius and treacherius... the best choise for the start your journey! it will provide you a rich experience with delicious flavor.

secondProduct.caffeDescription: Really dark coffee only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts witch caramel.

thirdProduct.caffeDescription: Sweet and intense witch a big amount of different flavor. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, and name it! It's great choise for warm summer days.
